00046 ObjectiveFunctionTemplate::~ObjectiveFunctionTemplate() {}
00047 
00048 void ObjectiveFunctionTemplate::initialize_queue( Mesh* mesh,
00049                                                MeshDomain* domain,
00050                                                const Settings* settings,
00051                                                MsqError& err )
00052 {
00053   qualityMetric->initialize_queue( mesh, domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00054 }
00055 
00056 bool ObjectiveFunctionTemplate::initialize_block_coordinate_descent( Mesh* mesh, 
00057                                                       MeshDomain* domain, 
00058                                                       const Settings* settings,
00059                                                       PatchSet* ,
00060                                                       MsqError& err )
00061 {
00062   std::auto_ptr<PatchSet> patch_set;
00063   switch (get_quality_metric()->get_metric_type())
00064   {
00065     case QualityMetric::VERTEX_BASED:  
00066       patch_set = std::auto_ptr<PatchSet>(new VertexPatches( 1, false ));
00067       break;
00068     case QualityMetric::ELEMENT_BASED: 
00069       patch_set = std::auto_ptr<PatchSet>(new ElementPatches);
00070       break;
00071     default: 
00072       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Cannot initialize for BCD for unknown metric type", 
00073                       MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00074       return false;
00075   }
00076 
00077   clear();
00078   patch_set->set_mesh( mesh );
00079   PatchIterator patches( patch_set.get() );
00080   
00081   PatchData pd;
00082   pd.set_mesh( mesh );
00083   pd.set_domain( domain );
00084   if (settings)
00085     pd.attach_settings( settings );
00086   
00087   bool result = true;
00088   while (patches.get_next_patch( pd, err ) && !MSQ_CHKERR(err))
00089   {
00090     double value;
00091     bool b = evaluate( ObjectiveFunction::ACCUMULATE, pd, value, false, err ); 
00092     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00093     result = result && b;
00094   }
00095   return result;
00096 }
00097 
00098 int ObjectiveFunctionTemplate::min_patch_layers() const
00099 {
00100   if (!get_quality_metric())
00101     return 0;
00102   else if (get_quality_metric()->get_metric_type() == QualityMetric::VERTEX_BASED)
00103     return 2;
00104   else
00105     return 1;
00106 }
